com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features

Class FeatureMagnetometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.BlueSTSDK.Feature
      • com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features.FeatureMagnetometer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FeatureRandomMagnetometer

    public class FeatureMagnetometer
extends Feature
    Feature used for contains the data from an magnetometer sensor. The data are in mg
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    STMicroelectronics - Central Labs.

      • extractData

        protected Feature.ExtractResult extractData(long timestamp,
                                            byte[] data,
                                            int dataOffset)
        extract the magnetometer data from the node raw data, it will read 3 int16 values
        Specified by:
        extractData in class Feature
        Parameters:
        data - array where read the Field data
        dataOffset - offset where start to read the data
        timestamp - data timestamp
        Returns:
        number of read byte (2) and data extracted (the magnetometer information)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the data array has not enough data
